title: Fruity vegetable muffins
ingredients: ['125 g (4½ oz) self-raising flour', '125 g (4½ oz) self-raising wholemeal flour', '2 tsp ground cinnamon', '170 g (6 oz) caster sugar', '55 g (2 oz) dried mixed fruit or raisins', '125 g (4½ oz) carrots, finely grated', '125 g (4½ oz) courgettes, finely grated', '125 ml (4½ fl oz) sunflower oil', '3 eggs']
